Key Responsibilities You will work with the Director, Producer, and occasionally a Director of Photography, on your assigned video production projects for DANAMIC and the clients of DNMC Creative from the pre-production to the post-production stage You may be required to conceptualise assigned video production projects You are to establish the camera setup for filming and decide which camera, lenses, and rigs will be best in accordance with the assigned video production project‚Äôs budget set by the producer You are to attend the location and technical recce sessions prior to filming and explore the potential of every location You are to operate the camera(s) and record audio during event coverages or filming sessions You may be required to lead a team of videographers on projects that require a multi-cam setup You are to wrangle the footage and location sound recording in an organised folder according to DNMC Creative‚Äôs standard structure You are to edit the offline cut and perform basic colour correction during post-production You are to neatly archive the project upon completion in accordance with DNMC Creative‚Äôs procedures To be adaptable to the different video production requirements of clients from across a spectrum of industries Skills & Experiences Proven working experience of 1-2 years in the Video Production industry, or in a related field Able to communicate effectively, both verbal and written, with the working team including technical terms such as shot sizes and movements, and the exposure triangle Have in-depth knowledge and understanding of a wide variety of cameras, their respective available recording codecs and compression capabilities, lenses, as well as rigging, and sound equipment Attentive to detail throughout the entire process from pre-production to post-production of any assigned video production projects Prior experience in other relevant production roles will be a bonus Proficient in video editing software(s) such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, and DaVinci Resolve, and basic knowledge of photo editing software(s) such as Adobe Lightroom and Photoshop Personal Characteristics Be self-motivated, energetic, and enthusiastic about being updated on the latest trends in technologies related to filmmaking Be open to constructive feedback Be inclusive and open to working with people from diverse backgrounds Proactive in learning and improving your craft Ability to perform high-quality work with minimum supervision within assigned deadlines A creative individual who is a problem-solver Reliable and able to work independently To operate with the mentality of self-ownership for the work created Team-spirited both internally and with the DANAMIC Network Passionate about Media, Technology and Opportunity If this sounds like you and you would like to find out more about this unique and exciting opportunity, then we want to hear from you! If you‚Äôre keen on joining us, please apply with the following: Your CV, and LinkedIn profile link (if applicable) Any samples of your work and interests, such as: Portfolio work as a content creator (e.g. photos, videos, etc.) Portfolio work on metrics (even if abbreviated for confidentiality) A short introduction about yourself Who We Are: DANAMIC is a collective, featuring DNMC Creative and its brand of subsidiaries, DNMC Visuals, DNMC+ Productions and DNMC Technology, alongside running danamic., its editorial arm. Based in Singapore, with our own in-house film production, photography and copywriting teams, DANAMIC and DNMC Creative form an integrated, full-fledged Creative Agency ‚Äì that understands and creates content at the speed of the culture. We reinvent the ways brands and companies communicate ‚Äî by crafting narratives that speak to their target audiences, not at them. Our Benefits: All our roles run on Hybrid Working (even before COVID); aside from our one mandated physical office day for Weekly All Company Sync-ups, you will be able to enjoy the preference of working at the office or from home, as long as deadlines and project standards are met. Aside from this role you will fill, you can request to take up opportunities to mirror and learn skills from across all our different departments, upon approval of the other department heads. We also offer Official Certification Courses due to our direct agency connection with platforms such as Meta (Facebook/Instagram) and TikTok, to help enhance your knowledge of said platforms. Furthermore, we are one of the first Unionised Creative Agencies in Singapore (i.e. a Corporate Member of the Creative Media and Publishing Union (CMPU)), which means you will be able to enjoy Union Member benefits (courtesy of CMPU/NTUC). Lastly, we offer additional Corporate Medical Benefits, including Group Hospital and Surgical Coverage, with Group General Practitioner (GP) and Group Outpatient Specialist (SP) for your well-being.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác ENTRY LEVEL FUN Sales Representative (MENTORSHIP PROVIDED) t·∫°i Momentum Organization About Us: We are a rapidly growing sales and marketing company, with a mission to satisfy our clients needs. Each of our people aim to do good in every aspects they can to excel in meeting every criteria set for us. We do not stop at just completing the job but instead go even further to achieve greater things outside of the needs of our clients. Job Description The success of this role will be measured on: ‚Ä¢ Work ethics - Are you able to work hard independently? ‚Ä¢ Behaviour - Do you show good attitude? ‚Ä¢ Sales - After receiving proper training and mentoring, are you able to generate the sale as you are required? ‚Ä¢ Teamwork - Are you able to work well in a small team and bring good results? The Successful Applicant To be a successful hire for this role, you have: ‚Ä¢ Good learning attitude - NO experience is needed, thus good learning attitude is a crucial factor looked out for ‚Ä¢ Commitment - Training and mentorship are provided to push you towards achieving your goals ‚Ä¢ Willingness to step out of comfort zone - Understanding what's required and going the extra mile to achieve them What's on Offer ‚Ä¢ Career progression ‚Ä¢ Travelling opportunities ‚Ä¢ Focused training and mentorship ‚Ä¢ Fun environment

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Livestreamer / Talent Agent t·∫°i BIGO LIVE Singapore [APPLICANTS MUST BE BASED IN SINGAPORE/MALAYSIA] BIGO LIVE is a Singapore-based live video streaming app. Some of the content that‚Äôs streamed on the platform include gaming, comedy, dancing, singing, and education. We're well-established globally with a footprint in over 150 countries and a broad demographic of 400 million users. BIGO LIVE Singapore is now receiving applications for official streamers and talent agents. We are a global livestreaming app that rewards you for showcasing your talents. If you have a hobby you enjoy and dream of sharing, or if you simply love meeting and interacting with people, we would love to hear from you. Streamer: Contract streamers earn money based on the virtual gifting targets achieved. There is a 24 hour 12 day requirement to fulfil in order to get the full remuneration (basic pay + Ôªøcommission). Agent: If you have a resource of content producers and talents: musicians, broadcasters, actors, singers, comedians, video creators, etc., we would love to collaborate with you. You can form an agency with us if you have a talent pool of 4-5 individuals (they can be hobbyists who sing, dance, vlog etc and need not be professional nor have streaming experience). How to apply: Register your interest via the form below. We look forward to hearing from you soon! Register here: bit.ly/bigolive

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Digitization Engineer t·∫°i Dimuto About DiMuto DiMuto redefines AgriTrade with AI, Data Visibility, and Finance ‚Äî Using tech to create and connect a sustainable, global AgriTrade ecosystem. A global Agri Fintech company based in Singapore, our mission is to use technology to transform global food supply chains for the better and tackle big issues like food waste and sustainability and the global trade finance gap. With our three pillars of Marketplace, Trade Management, and Trade Financing, DiMuto supports every aspect of AgriFood trading, redefining the way goods are managed from farm to table, seamlessly and simply connecting every step, and making it visible throughout. By traders for traders, we want to help AgriFood business owners optimize their operations efficiently and for them to build a foundation of trust between their buyers or sellers so that they can take action on improving and growing their businesses in a more sustainable, efficient manner. Maximizing Business Efficiency, Minimizing Impact on The Planet. Since 2019, DiMuto has successfully tracked and traced over millions of pieces in produce and millions in dollars of trade value on our platform, working with a global portfolio of clients in over ten countries and five continents. DiMuto is founded by Chief Executive Officer Mr Gary Loh, who is also the Executive Chairman of First Alverstone Group. About the Role: As a Digitization Engineer at DiMuto, your mission is global: ensure our cutting-edge Digitization Solutions seamlessly work for diverse operations worldwide. Dive into rapid prototyping, integrate vision devices, RFID readers, and industrial weighing solutions, all while wielding your expertise in C#, .NET Framework, WPF, and XAML. Your role extends beyond code ‚Äì manage inventory logistics, craft deployment plans, and be the linchpin for operational success. If you're a tech enthusiast ready to redefine global trade efficiency, DiMuto is your platform to make it happen! We welcome passionate individuals who are a team player and hunger for innovation to join the DiMuto team. What you‚Äôll be doing: ‚Ä¢ Work with cross-functional teams to conceptualize, detail design and deploy Digitization Solutions (Software & Hardware) for customers. ‚Ä¢ Rapid prototyping of future Digitization Solutions. ‚Ä¢ Integration of vision devices (cameras, 2D scanners) and industrial weighing solutions to windows-based device. ‚Ä¢ Conduct prototyping and software integrations of RFID readers to ensure compatibility with our digital platform. ‚Ä¢ Come up with BOMs, user manuals, test plans, deployment plans. ‚Ä¢ Responsible for overseeing the inventory management of parts at the headquarters and ensuring seamless tracking of inventory at remote offices. What you should have: ‚Ä¢ Degree or diploma in Mechatronics, Electronics, Electrical, Software Engineering. ‚Ä¢ Strong proficiency in C# programming language. ‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of the .NET Framework and WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation). ‚Ä¢ Proficiency in XAML for designing user interfaces. ‚Ä¢ Familiarity with MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel) design pattern & object-oriented programming. ‚Ä¢ Experience with data binding and data access techniques (API). ‚Ä¢ Experience in developing and maintaining desktop applications using WPF. ‚Ä¢ Experience with third-party WPF controls and libraries ‚Ä¢ Passion to explore & learn new technologies. ‚Ä¢ Independent, as well as a team player.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Permanent Part Time Weekend Retail Sales t·∫°i SABRINAGOH Join Our Team at SABRINAGOH! Are you passionate about fashion and have an eye for design? Do you thrive in a dynamic and creative environment? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! SABRINAGOH, a local designer retail store in Singapore, is seeking enthusiastic individuals to join our team as Retail Associates. Job Responsibilities: - Welcome and assist customers as they enter the store - Provide exceptional customer service by understanding and fulfilling their needs - Share product knowledge and styling tips to enhance customer satisfaction - Handle transactions and operate the point-of-sale system with accuracy - Maintain the visual merchandising standards and store cleanliness - Assist in inventory management, stock replenishment, and stocktaking - Collaborate with the team to achieve sales targets and store objectives - Contribute to a positive and friendly atmosphere for both customers and team members Requirements: - Passionate about fashion, design, and the latest trends - Excellent interpersonal and communication skills - A positive and customer-oriented attitude - Ability to work in a fast-paced environment - Flexible schedule, including weekends and public holidays - Prior retail experience is an advantage, but not mandatory Rewards & Remuneration: We are proud to offer a competitive base salary, and as a Retail Associate at SABRINAGOH Singapore, your hard work and dedication will be recognized and rewarded! You will have the opportunity to grow within the company and receive performance-based incentives based on your contributions. Join us in shaping the future of fashion and style in Singapore with SABRINAGOH. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Account Executive t·∫°i Hypotenuse AI About us üöÄ We‚Äôre building a new way for businesses to create content using AI, unlocking a new wave of creativity and productivity for marketing teams. The Hypotenuse AI platform manages and creates everything from blog articles and product descriptions to social media posts and images within seconds using AI‚Äîall in a way that captures a brand‚Äôs unique voice. We're reshaping what takes weeks to do, and turning it into days. We move fast. We‚Äôve got over 500,000 users globally, including some of the largest Fortune 500 brands, and are backed by top global investors like Y Combinator, January Capital, and many others. We‚Äôve got an experienced team of A-players with a background in AI research, FAANG, and top start-ups, and are looking for an account executive to join us. The role You‚Äôll be the driving force behind our explosive enterprise growth and strategic partnerships. Your role will be dynamic, continually adapting as our company accelerates. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of your core responsibilities: Generate new pipeline through value-driven outreach, while qualifying inbounds and guiding them through our sales process Clearly communicate, discover and demo to key stakeholders, helping them understand and quantify our platform‚Äôs use cases in a consultative sales manner Navigate champions through their org's budget, legal, security, and procurement processes. Note that this is often a pioneering sale, where the budget allocation for our solution could be unprecedented. Analyze industry trends and identify potential verticals for growth. Collaborate with our product and marketing teams to fine-tune our offering based on customer feedback and market requirements. Negotiate contracts and close deals that fuel our rapid expansion. Sound like you? üôå We're looking for individuals with an unstoppable mentality who can thrive in a fast-paced environment. Working here won‚Äôt be easy‚Äîit‚Äôs not a 9‚Äì5 role in a big company. It will be demanding, and comes with a lot of hard work and long hours. But with that, comes magnitudes more impact, learnings, and growth than anywhere else. We want people who aren‚Äôt just looking for another job but are excited about building something new. We love ex-founders, or people who want to become founders themselves in the future. Here, your rate of growth matters more than where you‚Äôre at right now. We look for people who are: Obsessively driven: you‚Äôre someone who‚Äôs relentless, hungry to learn, and will place personal ambition as one of your biggest priorities right now. Scrappy: you get things done despite limited resources or circumstances going against you. Hands-on: if you‚Äôre looking for a job to do ‚Äústrategy‚Äù, or lots of theoretical planning, but not actually get your hands dirty yourself, then we‚Äôre likely not a fit. The skills üéØ At least 2+ years of experience in any of: BD/SDR/Sales/Account management Strong familiarity with B2B, SaaS tools and start-ups Demonstrated performance in hitting and exceeding quotas Experience with how enterprise sales processes typically work Able to speak to and sell to customers globally, with a strong inclination for US companies Strong verbal and written communication skills Note: must be based in Singapore or willing to relocate there.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Marketing Intern t·∫°i DSTNCT Pte Ltd AGENCY FOR THE NEXT GEN We are all about the next generation. Next generation of consumers. Next generation of platforms. Next generation of content. Next generation of brands. That‚Äôs what gets us up every day. Working with you to be at the forefront of the next generation. To create relevant and industry-defining work. Whether it‚Äôs to better align on your business challenges, understand the people you need to reach, tell the stories you‚Äôve always wanted to tell or to identify the best direction to get there ‚Äì when you work us, you get a team who knows that if we don‚Äôt rethink everything, we change nothing. What We Do We may be a creative agency but we are most certainly not in the business of advertising. We are in the business of understanding the human psyche. We obsess over the psychology of our audience - what people are into, their pain-points and motivations, what makes them tick ‚Äì we take all of that and we bring you and your brand to wherever people are ‚Äì physically, virtually and emotionally. That has allowed us to transcend conventional channels to be able to take care of a full spectrum of services for a holistic audience experience. Integrated Marketing Products and Platforms Social and Content Branding UI/UX Experiential Data & Technology Culture Working at DSTNCT means joining a group of people who are passionate about doing great work. Work that challenges the status quo. Work that inspires new ways of thinking. Work that makes people‚Äôs lives just a tad bit easier. It‚Äôs not bullshit. It‚Äôs a code that we live by. A way of life. Don‚Äôt believe us? Talk to us and we will show you a preview of our Culture Code to see what we mean. There are a few things that make us all tick. Being open and taking chances. Taking pride in your work. Doing the right thing. Working as a team. Being resourceful and solving problems. We‚Äôve always believed that you‚Äôre the average of the 5 people you surround yourself with. It‚Äôs time to ask yourself: What kind of people do you want to be around with? Purpose of the Role You will be tasked for the coordination of advertising campaigns and therefore communicating clearly to all those involved. You must understand the clients' needs and objectives and liaise closely with your account manager throughout campaigns, often on a daily basis. You are required to manage administrative and campaign work and ensure that advertising projects are completed on time. The role can involve handling multiple accounts and the hours can be long in a competitive environment. You are required to report to your account manager. Key Responsibilities Working with agency colleagues to devise an advertising campaign that meets the client's brief and budget; Presenting alongside agency colleagues (particularly the Account Manager), the campaign ideas and budget to the client; Working with the Account Manager to brief media, creative and research staff and assisting with the formulation of marketing strategies; Ensuring that communication flows effectively; Negotiating with clients and agency staff about the details of campaigns; Writing client reports; Monitoring the effectiveness of campaigns; Undertaking administration tasks; Arranging and attending meetings; Making 'pitches', along with other agency staff, to try to win new business for the agency. Required Skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; A proactive attitude, with the ability to use initiative; Excellent organisational skills; The ability to work under pressure and assimilate large quantities of information quickly, while maintaining attention to detail; drive; Effective teamworking skills; Influencing and negotiation skills; Oral and written communication skills; Commercial awareness; A passion for advertising and an understanding of what makes a good advertisement; A willingness to learn; Resilience, to enable you to deal with problems and constructive criticism; IT literacy and an awareness of how the industry is developing in light of new communication technologies. Monitoring the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. The Company reserves the right to vary, modify, add or remove any item into the Job Description by giving written notice to you.

We obsess over the psychology of our audience - what people are into, their pain-points and motivations, what makes them tick ‚Äì we take all of that and we bring you and your brand to wherever people are ‚Äì physically, virtually and emotionally. That has allowed us to transcend conventional channels to be able to take care of a full spectrum of services for a holistic audience experience. Integrated Marketing Products and Platforms Social and Content Branding UI/UX Experiential Data & Technology Culture Working at DSTNCT means joining a group of people who are passionate about doing great work. Work that challenges the status quo. Work that inspires new ways of thinking. Work that makes people‚Äôs lives just a tad bit easier. It‚Äôs not bullshit. It‚Äôs a code that we live by. A way of life. Don‚Äôt believe us? Talk to us and we will show you a preview of our Culture Code to see what we mean. There are a few things that make us all tick. Being open and taking chances. Taking pride in your work. Doing the right thing. Working as a team. Being resourceful and solving problems. We‚Äôve always believed that you‚Äôre the average of the 5 people you surround yourself with. It‚Äôs time to ask yourself: What kind of people do you want to be around with? Purpose of the Role You will be tasked for the coordination of advertising campaigns and therefore communicating clearly to all those involved. You must understand the clients' needs and objectives and liaise closely with your account manager throughout campaigns, often on a daily basis. You are required to manage administrative and campaign work and ensure that advertising projects are completed on time. The role can involve handling multiple accounts and the hours can be long in a competitive environment. You are required to report to your account manager. Key Responsibilities Working with agency colleagues to devise an advertising campaign that meets the client's brief and budget; Presenting alongside agency colleagues (particularly the Account Manager), the campaign ideas and budget to the client; Working with the Account Manager to brief media, creative and research staff and assisting with the formulation of marketing strategies; Ensuring that communication flows effectively; Negotiating with clients and agency staff about the details of campaigns; Writing client reports; Monitoring the effectiveness of campaigns; Undertaking administration tasks; Arranging and attending meetings; Making 'pitches', along with other agency staff, to try to win new business for the agency. Required Skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; A proactive attitude, with the ability to use initiative; Excellent organisational skills; The ability to work under pressure and assimilate large quantities of information quickly, while maintaining attention to detail; drive; Effective teamworking skills; Influencing and negotiation skills; Oral and written communication skills; Commercial awareness; A passion for advertising and an understanding of what makes a good advertisement; A willingness to learn; Resilience, to enable you to deal with problems and constructive criticism; IT literacy and an awareness of how the industry is developing in light of new communication technologies. Monitoring the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. The Company reserves the right to vary, modify, add or remove any item into the Job Description by giving written notice to you.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Business Operations Intern (Dec - May) (part-time available) t·∫°i GetSolar Care about climate change and want to contribute to solve it? Aspire to shape and contribute to a fast-growing climate technology start-up as an early employee? This could be your opportunity. Apply now at forms.gle/bo1Ap3mdQa6HFhi2A The opportunity In this role, you‚Äôll own and manage key operational tasks associated with the sales process of our residential solar projects. You‚Äôll be working closely with our CEO and be a part of a small but collaborative community in ENGIE Factory, passionate about using technology and innovation to solve climate change. We don‚Äôt see our interns any differently from one of us. If you‚Äôre up for it, lead teams, craft strategies or drive new initiatives ‚Äì the sky‚Äôs the limit. What you‚Äôll be responsible for While we encourage you to take ownership of your role and spend time on areas that you find exciting, the following tasks are likely to be a part of your role: Actively manage all aspects of the solar installation process and own our internal project tracker to ensure an optimal experience for our customers Take ownership of every residential client‚Äôs experience from site visits through to a successful installation including managing all enquiries and requests for assistance from customers Liaise with solar contractors on project management to ensure smooth project implementation and construction Assist in document management to ensure our internal records are always up-to-date and properly maintained Proactively identify and evaluate new opportunities for process optimisation and improved customer experience What you'll gain from the internship Learn to use and effectively work with sales and operations tools like Hubspot, Airtable, Google Analytics Effective project management and customer management skills Learn to work with various internal and external stakeholders including partners, financiers in order to execute deals Gain insights into the internet industry as well as the regional renewables market Who we‚Äôre looking for Have strong attention to detail, meticulous and careful with managing information Creative problem solver, able to actively identify areas of improvement and enjoys optimising efficiency on processes Entrepreneurial spirit and genuinely excited by a fast paced start-up environment Strong willingness to learn and pick up new skills Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and deal with ambiguity Contract type and location You must be able to commit for a minimum of 16 weeks, up to a maximum of 9 months. The role will be based in Singapore with a flexible start date. How to apply We encourage interested applicants to write a short cover note stating your availability, your relevant portfolio and why you want to join us in your application. We review applications on a rolling basis, and unfortunately may only reach out to shortlisted applicants. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Fashion Retail Associate t·∫°i SABRINAGOH Join Our Team at SABRINAGOH! Are you passionate about fashion and have an eye for design? Do you thrive in a dynamic and creative environment? If so, we have the perfect opportunity for you! SABRINAGOH, a local designer retail store in Singapore, is seeking enthusiastic individuals to join our team as Retail Associates. Job Responsibilities: - Welcome and assist customers as they enter the store - Provide exceptional customer service by understanding and fulfilling their needs - Share product knowledge and styling tips to enhance customer satisfaction - Handle transactions and operate the point-of-sale system with accuracy - Maintain the visual merchandising standards and store cleanliness - Assist in inventory management, stock replenishment, and stocktaking - Collaborate with the team to achieve sales targets and store objectives - Contribute to a positive and friendly atmosphere for both customers and team members Requirements: - Passionate about fashion, design, and the latest trends - Excellent interpersonal and communication skills - A positive and customer-oriented attitude - Ability to work in a fast-paced environment - Flexible schedule, including weekends and public holidays - Prior retail experience is an advantage, but not mandatory Rewards & Remuneration: We are proud to offer a competitive base salary, and as a Retail Associate at SABRINAGOH Singapore, your hard work and dedication will be recognized and rewarded! You will have the opportunity to grow within the company and receive performance-based incentives based on your contributions. Join us in shaping the future of fashion and style in Singapore with SABRINAGOH. We look forward to welcoming you to our team!

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Operation Technician (Trainee) t·∫°i Advario Asia Pacific Pte. Ltd. Job Highlights Opportunity to work with MNC with strong presence in its industry Lunch and transport will be provided from designated place Your Tasks: Operate the terminal system (including jetties) according to the company's work procedures by efficiently carrying out the Daily Action Plan, updating the daily checklists and shift logs in order to keep track of the most recent procedures and track activities. Ensure compliance with all HSSEQ rules and regulations, including wearing the appropriate PPE, and assume suitable role(s) stipulated in the terminal's Emergency Response Plan (ERP), in order to guarantee safety of the terminal, the employees and the individual. Properly perform checks on the terminal systems (moving and non-moving), undertake routine checks and house-keeping on a regular basis and supervise mooring crew activities, in order to guarantee safe procedures and prevent failures to the terminal system. Learn how to and, if certified competently, independently perform: WDO, sampling, tank gauging, valve and pump checks, pump strainer cleaning and operating waste water system Conduct ship-shore conferences and berthing/unberthing vessels in accordance with company's work procedure. Report all unusual incidents in the terminal and raise maintenance request form for equipments failure, in order to keep the terminal running without errors. Complete all task evaluations under the Operations, Training, HSSEQ, HR Department and OCIMF for a Trainee Technician. Your profile: Preferably a Diploma in Engineering/ Maritime Studies. Ideally have at least 1 - 2 years of Terminal experience. Candidates without experience are welcomed to apply. Possess good attitude towards work and a willingness to learn. Has an affinity towards safety. Good interpersonal skills and has the ability to resolve issues as a team. We offer you among other things: Special benefits and company events organized for employees. Employees are covered under the group insurance plan, with dependent coverage for hospitalization. Please note: An Operation Technician works in Jurong Island terminal with a team on a 12 hours rotating shift basis. Lunch will be provided while in the terminal during day work (weekdays only) and shuttle bus pick up point located at Boon Lay MRT. This is an entry level position.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Operations Intern t·∫°i WhyQ Pte Ltd. WhyQ is Singapore's largest hawker food delivery service and is one of Singapore's fastest growing startups. We are looking for a highly driven and motivated intern who can thrive in a startup culture. Having just raised our Series A2 funding round, we are growing our team and expanding aggressively. This is an extremely exciting opportunity for anyone to play a high-impact, key role in a young and dynamic Operations team. Key Responsibilities Work closely with the Co-Founders and Operations Manager to roll out new features to streamline operational processes across the company Fleet Management of over 100 contractors Assist Operations manager with proposing, and implementing tech and automation throughout all aspects of operations in WhyQ Provide key insights through field knowledge and identifying upcoming food trends in the market Problem solving Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills Ability to adapt to high stress, fast-moving and changing environment High sense of ownership. Willing to be on the ground and get your hands dirty to ensure operations run smoothly Possess entrepreneurial mindset with a strong drive to challenge the status quo Logical individual with strong sense of urgency and organisational skills Requirements: Self-motivated and takes initiative to solve problem Positive mindset, responsible and independent Candidates who are keen on joining a startup We are looking for motivated individuals who are available to join us for a period of at least 3 months to 6 months . Working Hours: 9.30am to 6.30pm, on weekdays, able to work from home.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Influencer Marketing Manager (Contract) t·∫°i EpicNgage Media Pte Ltd Responsibilities - Create and implement influencer marketing strategies that are in line with the overall marketing goals. - We will identify and engage with influencers who align with our target audience and brand values. - Responsibilities include handling influencer partnerships, contract negotiations, content planning, and feedback provision. - Provide regular reports on campaign performance, including metrics such as engagement, reach, and ROI. - Work with cross-functional teams, such as social media, creative, and PR, to establish cohesive and successful campaigns. - It is important to stay informed about industry trends and best practices in influencer marketing. - Monitor financial resources and ensure efficient implementation of campaigns within established budgetary limits. Requirements - The job requires prior experience as an Influencer Marketing Manager or in a similar position - Possessing a thorough knowledge of social media platforms and their optimal techniques - Understanding influencer marketing strategies and techniques - Possessing strong communication and negotiation abilities - The candidate possesses skills in data analysis and providing insights to inform campaign optimization - This individual possesses a creative mindset and strong project management skills - A degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field at the Bachelor's level is required - Individuals with experience in successful influencer marketing campaigns are encouraged to apply for this exciting opportunity.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Programmer t·∫°i Adzaan Consulting Pte Ltd We are looking for an enthusiastic and versatile software developer to join our team in upgrading and scaling our in-house condition monitoring software called ADZAAN ROAM (Remote Online Analytical Monitoring) platform. The ROAM platform comprises of the software coupled to various sensors (vibraiton, current, temperature etc) and data acquisition hardware. It is currently coded using National Instruments Labview graphical programming software. Experience in using Labivew is a great advantage, preferably with CLD, CLAD or CLA certification from NI.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Marketing Executive t·∫°i Orange Interior Pte Ltd As a Marketing Executive, you will play a pivotal role in creating and implementing marketing strategies across various digital platforms to enhance brand awareness, engage with the audience, and drive business growth. You will be responsible for managing social media accounts, content creation, and analyzing campaign performance. Key Responsibilities: * Social Media Management: - Develop and maintain a comprehensive social media strategy for the company. - Manage and curate content across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and others. - Monitor social media trends, engage with followers, and respond to comments and inquiries. * Content Creation: - Create engaging and relevant content, including posts, images, videos, and infographics, to attract and retain a target audience. - Schedule and publish content on social media platforms, ensuring consistency and brand voice. * Campaign Development: - Plan and execute marketing campaigns that align with business objectives. - Utilize advertising platforms (e.g., Facebook Ads, Google Ads) to optimize ad campaigns. - Collaborate with internal teams to ensure campaign success. * Analytics and Reporting: - Monitor and analyze social media and website metrics to evaluate the performance of marketing efforts. - Provide regular reports and insights on key performance indicators (KPIs) to make data-driven decisions. * Brand Collaboration: - Build and nurture an online community around the brand by fostering engagement and interactions. - Manage influencer relationships and partnerships, if applicable. * SEO and Website Management: - Optimize website content for search engines to increase organic traffic. - Ensure the website is up-to-date with the latest information and user-friendly. Qualifications: * Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field. * Proven experience in social media management and digital marketing. * Proficiency in social media platforms and social media management tools. * Strong writing and content creation skills. * Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and generate insights. * Knowledge of SEO and website management. * Creative thinking and the ability to stay updated with industry trends. Additional Information: * This is a full-time position. * Salary and benefits will be commensurate with experience. * Career progression opportunities * Incentive trips
require: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Marketing Executive t·∫°i Orange Interior Pte Ltd As a Marketing Executive, you will play a pivotal role in creating and implementing marketing strategies across various digital platforms to enhance brand awareness, engage with the audience, and drive business growth. You will be responsible for managing social media accounts, content creation, and analyzing campaign performance. Key Responsibilities: * Social Media Management: - Develop and maintain a comprehensive social media strategy for the company. - Manage and curate content across platforms such as Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and others. - Monitor social media trends, engage with followers, and respond to comments and inquiries. * Content Creation: - Create engaging and relevant content, including posts, images, videos, and infographics, to attract and retain a target audience. - Schedule and publish content on social media platforms, ensuring consistency and brand voice. * Campaign Development: - Plan and execute marketing campaigns that align with business objectives. - Utilize advertising platforms (e.g., Facebook Ads, Google Ads) to optimize ad campaigns. - Collaborate with internal teams to ensure campaign success. * Analytics and Reporting: - Monitor and analyze social media and website metrics to evaluate the performance of marketing efforts. - Provide regular reports and insights on key performance indicators (KPIs) to make data-driven decisions. * Brand Collaboration: - Build and nurture an online community around the brand by fostering engagement and interactions. - Manage influencer relationships and partnerships, if applicable. * SEO and Website Management: - Optimize website content for search engines to increase organic traffic. - Ensure the website is up-to-date with the latest information and user-friendly. Qualifications: * Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field. * Proven experience in social media management and digital marketing. * Proficiency in social media platforms and social media management tools. * Strong writing and content creation skills. * Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and generate insights. * Knowledge of SEO and website management. * Creative thinking and the ability to stay updated with industry trends. Additional Information: * This is a full-time position. * Salary and benefits will be commensurate with experience. * Career progression opportunities * Incentive trips

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Social Media Manager t·∫°i BRCKTS The Opportunity A grand opportunity to learn and grow in a digital storytelling collective that seeks to disrupt the way brands engage their audiences. Candidates will be deep dive into social media and content marketing strategy, viral tactics, digital PR, and get hands-on experience in various facets of creative production including copywriting, graphic design, illustration, gif/ meme creation, digital photography, and online videos. Job Description Social Media Strategy ‚Äì Interpret client brief, research, data mine, plan, develop and design social media activations, campaigns and/or editorial calendar that meets business and/or campaign objectives. Content Management ‚Äì Manage assets, monthly editorial calendars and oversee publishing schedules Creative Conceptualisation & Content Creation ‚Äì Ideate and conceptualise content pillars and story ideas. Oversee art direction and storyboarding/ scripting. Design and execute quality creative content, including but not limited to product photography, portrait photography, lifestyle video, motion graphic/ animation, gif, illustration, graphic design etc for digital and social media platforms. Social Media Ad Planning & Buying ‚Äì Propose and execute social media amplification to support the overall strategy that meets campaign objectives. Monitor, optimize, track and report ad performances. Analytics ‚Äì Analyse social data/metrics, insights and transfer learnings into best practices. Generate monthly and quarterly social media performance reports. Deliver insights and learnings to make informed decisions for editorial calendar development in order to achieve KPIs. Community Management ‚Äì Oversee the day-to-day queries and interactions with page fans and/or social media users. Support and facilitate clients to uphold the standards of social customer care and ensure response time meets clients‚Äô expectations. Influencer Engagement ‚Äì Manage influence engagement campaigns on ad-hoc basis. Influencer engagement ideation, profiling, crafting of brief and liaising with influencers to achieve the client‚Äôs objectives. New Business ‚Äì Participate in new business initiatives, from identifying opportunities to pitch development, brainstorm and presentations Internal marketing ‚Äì Be involved in internal marketing initiatives and suggest creative ideas for the company Project management ‚Äì Take the lead in projects assigned and ensure deliverables are met in a timely manner. Build positive relationships with the internal stakeholders and clients whilst up keeping clear, concise, professional communication. Support the Account Director in coordinating and liaising between media agency, clients, and creative team to put together these calendars on time and on brief. Requirements At least 3 years of experience in social media and/or digital marketing position. Monthly remuneration scaled based on experience, skillsets, portfolio and aptitude. Independent, task-oriented and strong ownership over accounts and projects assigned. Strong organisational and interpersonal skills. Results-oriented, meticulous and passion for world class execution Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Working knowledge of MAC systems and programs. This is a hybrid work arrangement, with 2 work days required at the office and 3 work days work from home/ remote.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Swimming Instructor (Freelance) t·∫°i Metropolitan YMCA Singapore The Freelance Swimming Instructor is responsible for the effective and relevant delivery and administration of the service and/or programmes in accordance with the agreed terms and conditions (including the code of conduct). Key Functions 1. Demonstrates thorough knowledge of the curriculum, rules, standards and procedures involved in the delivery of the aquatic programmes to the assigned participants and to ensure active participation. 2. To be accountable and report to the Programme Manager in the following areas: Provides feedback and evaluation of the aquatic programmes periodically or whenever the needs arise to continually improve the programme quality. Ensures that the aquatic programmes are implemented and carried out according to the relevant legislation, policies and procedures Adheres to rules and regulations, including usage of facilities 3. Safety Ensures that courses are conducted in a safe and secure environment 4. Administration Ensures participant‚Äôs attendance and assessment are marked and updated before the end of every session Adheres to completing all sessions promptly within the assigned timeline and/or term period, taking care to avoid prolonging of programme timeline Assists in distributing relevant documents (e.g. students‚Äô certificate, and progression cards) 5. Stakeholders (Parent / Participant / Agency) Relation Handles feedback and concerns raised by parents and participants professionally and promptly Ensures regular communication with participants and parents, with follow-up on participants‚Äô development and progress Attends all related activities/meetings/conferences/training relevant 6. Assists in carrying out other duties related to aquatics as assigned when needs arises. Pre-requisites Interest in serving the vulnerable community (e.g. children and families from needy families, children with special needs and lonely seniors) Able to work with participants of different age groups Possesses ASCTA, AUSTSWIM Teacher of Swimming and Water Safety (TSW) / NCAP Level 1 Swimming Instructor Possesses Lifesaving 1, 2, 3 or Bronze Medallion Possesses CPR and AED certification Possesses relevant coaching experience Able to work on weekdays evening and Saturday Able to conduct classes independently

Job scope ‚Ä¢ Creating infographics and graphic designing ‚Ä¢ Social Media and Telegram Channel Management ‚Ä¢ Source, create and share lifestyle content ‚Ä¢ Be part of the marketing team implementing new marketing strategies ‚Ä¢ Attending exclusive media events Requirements ‚Ä¢ Competent, responsible and positive ‚Ä¢ Familiar with Telegram Channels in Singapore ‚Ä¢ Experience with graphic design tools such as Sketch, Adobe Suite, Canva, etc. ‚Ä¢ Photography skills (would be a plus)

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Senior Account Executive (Marketing) t·∫°i DSTNCT Pte Ltd AGENCY FOR THE NEXT GEN We are all about the next generation. Next generation of consumers. Next generation of platforms. Next generation of content. Next generation of brands. That‚Äôs what gets us up every day. Working with brands to be at the forefront of the next generation. To create relevant and industry-defining work. Whether it‚Äôs to better align on the brand's business challenges, understand the people they need to reach, tell the stories they‚Äôve always wanted to tell or to identify the best direction to get there ‚Äì when brands work with us, they get a team who knows that if we don‚Äôt rethink everything, we change nothing. What We Do We may be a creative agency but we are most certainly not in the business of advertising. We are in the business of understanding the human psyche. We obsess over the psychology of our audience - what people are into, their pain-points and motivations, what makes them tick ‚Äì we take all of that and we bring you and your brand to wherever people are ‚Äì physically, virtually and emotionally. That has allowed us to transcend conventional channels to be able to take care of a full spectrum of services for a holistic audience experience. Integrated Marketing Products and Platforms Social and Content Branding UI/UX Experiential Data & Technology Culture Working at DSTNCT means joining a group of people who are passionate about doing great work. Work that challenges the status quo. Work that inspires new ways of thinking. Work that makes people‚Äôs lives just a tad bit easier. It‚Äôs not bullshit. It‚Äôs a code that we live by. A way of life. Don‚Äôt believe us? Talk to us and we will show you a preview of our Culture Code to see what we mean. There are a few things that make us all tick. Being open and taking chances. Taking pride in your work. Doing the right thing. Working as a team. Being resourceful and solving problems. We‚Äôve always believed that you‚Äôre the average of the 5 people you surround yourself with. It‚Äôs time to ask yourself: What kind of people do you want to be around with? Purpose of the Role The Senior Account Executive is responsible for the day-to-day project management within the account that he is handling. He is also responsible to oversee the activities of the junior executives. The Senior Account Executive is responsible for managing the client, receiving new briefs and building a strong relationship with the client. He is also required to grow the account, securing bigger budgets and retain the account year on year. He is also required to strictly follow the processes set out in place by the management and to manage campaign budgets, making sure the campaign is profitable. Key Responsibilities Assist the Account Manager and Account Director with management of clients and projects. Develop and implement marketing strategies. Retain and renew key business accounts. Building management skills by mentoring and managing junior executives Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Working with the Account Manager to brief creative team and strategy team and assisting with the formulation of marketing strategies; Handling budgets and managing campaign costs; Writing client reports; Making 'pitches', along with other agency staff, to try to win new business for the agency. Required Skills 3-4 years of working experience in integrated marketing communications preferably in an agency setting Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; Any leadership experience in mentoring a junior will be a bonus A proactive attitude, with the ability to use initiative; Well-organised, detail-oriented, digitally and socially-savvy The ability to work under pressure and assimilate large quantities of information quickly, while maintaining attention to detail; Effective teamworking and time management skills; Influencing and negotiation skills; Oral and written communication skills; Commercial awareness; A passion for advertising and an understanding of what makes a good advertisement; A willingness to learn; Resilience, to enable you to deal with problems and constructive criticism; IT literacy and an awareness of how the industry is developing in light of new communication technologies. Monitoring the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. The Company reserves the right to vary, modify, add or remove any item into the Job Description by giving written notice to you.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Client Management Executive t·∫°i Singapore First Aid Training Centre Are you a go-getter with a passion for sales and results? Do you love building relationships and helping clients achieve their goals? If so, we want to hear from you! We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Client Management Executive (CME) to join us on our mission to save lives through education. The CME will be responsible for overseeing the efficient operation of courses and maintaining strong client relationships. In this role, you will be responsible for:Handling sales inquiries and course-related questions from clients. Cultivating and maintaining strong client relationships, both with corporate and individual clients. Meeting client response and follow-up targets to ensure a high level of customer satisfaction. Facilitating and scheduling course registrations, ensuring smooth enrolment processes. Providing funding advice to clients and assisting in the submission of funding applications where applicable. Coordinating the allocation of trainers for courses, ensuring effective utilization of resources. Preparing and sending invoices to clients for course fees. Ensuring that clients receive course certificates in a timely manner. If you are looking for a challenging and rewarding career opportunity, this is the role for you! What you will get: A competitive salary and benefits package. The opportunity to work with a team of talented and passionate professionals. A chance to make a real difference in the lives of our clients. The opportunity to grow and develop your skills. What we are looking for: - Excellent client relationship management skills. - Proven experience in dealing with both corporate and individual clients. - Effective time management and organizational skills to handle multiple tasks efficiently. - Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to engage effectively at all levels. - Familiarity with SSG training fund schemes is a plus. If you are ready to take your career to the next level, apply today!

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác 2-Months Experiential Financial Advisory Internship t·∫°i L-Earn @ FFA DISCOVER the profession and SCALE your income through our L-Earn Advisory Internship We are looking for pre-university or undergrads who find themselves in one or more of the following groups: You want a platform that empower you to have a head start in achieving time and financial freedom You want to be a financial planner that can value-add in an authentic manner without aggressive sales method You want to build a sustainable and profitable business that is proven for many years Our internship is an excellent way for Pre-Uni or Undergraduates to gain valuable insights into the financial advisory industry. A way of life. Don‚Äôt believe us? Talk to us and we will show you a preview of our Culture Code to see what we mean. There are a few things that make us all tick. Being open and taking chances. Taking pride in your work. Doing the right thing. Working as a team. Being resourceful and solving problems. We‚Äôve always believed that you‚Äôre the average of the 5 people you surround yourself with. It‚Äôs time to ask yourself: What kind of people do you want to be around with? Purpose of the Role The Account Executive is responsible for the day to day project management within the account that he is handling. He needs to have a strong understanding of the advertising/marketing landscape and be passionate about the job. An Account Executive is responsible for managing the client, receiving new briefs and building a strong relationship with the client. He is also required to grow the account, securing bigger budgets and retain the account year on year. He also acts as the middle person for the agency team and the client. Where information is given by the client needs to be translated into a proper brief for the managers and the creative team. He is also required to strictly follow the processes set out in place by the management and to manage campaign budgets, making sure the campaign is profitable. Key Responsibilities Assist the Account Manager and Account Director with management of clients and projects. Maintains assigned relationships with clients, establishing self and DSTNCT as an invaluable long-term partner for marketing and communications services Meeting and liaising with clients to discuss and identify their advertising requirements; Working with agency colleagues to devise an advertising campaign that meets the client's brief and budget; Presenting alongside agency colleagues (particularly the account manager), the campaign ideas and budget to the client; Working with the account manager to brief creative team and strategy team and assisting with the formulation of marketing strategies; Liaising with, and acting as the link between, the client and the advertising agency by maintaining regular contact with both, Ensuring that communication flows effectively; Negotiating with clients and agency staff about the details of campaigns; Presenting creative work to clients for approval or modification; Handling budgets and managing campaign costs; Writing client reports; Monitoring the effectiveness of campaigns; Undertaking administration tasks; Arranging and attending meetings; Making 'pitches', along with other agency staff, to try to win new business for the agency. Required Skills Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; A proactive attitude, with the ability to use initiative; Excellent organisational skills; The ability to work under pressure and assimilate large quantities of information quickly, while maintaining attention to detail; Effective teamworking skills; Influencing and negotiation skills; Oral and written communication skills; Commercial awareness; A passion for advertising and an understanding of what makes a good advertisement; A willingness to learn; Resilience, to enable you to deal with problems and constructive criticism; IT literacy and an awareness of how the industry is developing in light of new communication technologies. Monitoring the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. The Company reserves the right to vary, modify, add or remove any item into the Job Description by giving written notice to you

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Financial Sales Representative t·∫°i Phillip Nova Pte Ltd Phillip Nova is one of the leading local broker with founding clearing members of Singapore Exchange Derivatives Trading (SGX-DT). Here in Phillip Nova, we offer a comprehensive range of asset classes from Shares, CFD, Futures & options, FX and Precious Metal where investor, professional trader or corporate can choose from an array of electronic trading platforms to suit their investment profile. We are actively on the hunt for candidate who are self-motivated and keen to build your own business. If you are someone who is self-motivated, with a strong interest in shares and derivative market and enjoys working in a collaborative team in servicing and providing solutions to customers, join us as Financial Sales Representative, where your portfolio entails as below: Canvass and acquire for potential customers Follow up closely with all prosepctive customers through product recommendations, campaigns and trading system demponstation Collaborate with Phillip Nova to actively market the suites of product offerings for on-boarding new customers to grow our market presence Maintain strong knowledge of the trading platform features and capabilities in providing and educating customers of platform abilities Keep abreast of global and economic news in order to provide trading support to customers Building and networking with existing customers to provide consultative selling to meet customer's trading needs Build and maintain strong customers relationships as well as after-sales service Active monitoring of existing customers' activity to assess their needs and provide required trading support to increase Phillip Nova market share Perform risk management of customers' portfolio in ensuring portfolio maintains healthy level We are looking for: Entrepreneurial with a positive outlook and sales driven to build your business Result orientated and hungry for success Enjoy being in fast track environment Enjoy meeting people and providing consultative & investment solutions Strong interest in equitities, finance and commodity markets This is a fully commission (full-time) sales role. Successful candidate will receive full sponsorship of CMFAS examination fees and entitled for attractive training allowances while on mentorship programme. You will also be able to obtain additional regulated licenses to provide one stop value-added investment solution to your customers. We will be able to take yourcareer further through as rewarding remuneration awaits, join us by sending your resume. Application Requirements: Minimum Diploma and above preferably in the discipline of finance Preferably 1 year of experience in related industry /or with sales experiences of any industry. Candidate without experiences is also welcome to apply Selected candidates are required to pass CMFAS paper M5, M1A, M2A, M6 & M6A Applicant currently preparing for CMFAS Exams is welcome to apply Only Singaporean & PR may apply In Phillip Nova, we don't offer a job we believed our strong partnership will take your portfolio to next level.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Speech & Drama Instructor (Freelance) t·∫°i Metropolitan YMCA Singapore We are looking for passionate freelance instructors to join our team to deliver children‚Äôs speech & drama classes and foster a love of language and theatre in the young learners. Responsibilities Deliver speech & drama curriculum / lesson plans appropriate for children Prepare for classes, ensuring that children are well engaged and having fun during lessons Handle all aspects of dramatization such as rehearsals, managing props, make-up costumes and stage directions Communicate with parents on children‚Äôs progress Requirements Grade 7 certification in English Speech and Drama or an equivalent professional qualification from an established local / international institution Prior experience with children‚Äôs speech & drama classes Effective classroom management skills Enthusiastic and committed individuals who are reliable and dedicated MOE and PA-registered will be an advantage Job Type: Freelance Salary: $50.00 - $60.00 per hour Schedule: Flexible hours

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Specialist Tutor (Flexi Scheme) t·∫°i Dyslexia Association Of Singapore We are looking for individuals with a passion in teaching children but are not able to commit to a full time job. Candidates must be able to commit to a minimum of 8 teaching hours per week. All candidates must be registered with the Ministry of Education (MOE) before they can start teaching at the DAS. The duties of a Specialist Tutor include: Creating a dynamic curriculum for individuals in consultation with the Head of DAS International Preparing lessons and resources Teaching individuals and/or small groups of students Developing and adapting conventional teaching methods to meet the individual needs of students Using special facilities, such as audiovisual materials and computers, to stimulate interest in learning Conducting ongoing formative and summative assessments for students Consulting, if required, with Speech-Language Therapists and Educational Psychologists Liaising closely with parents Liaising with international schools Updating and maintaining records on students' progress For more information, please visit our website das.org.sg.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Public Relations Consultant t·∫°i Emplifi About Us: Brand Cellar is an integrated PR and marketing communications firm specializing in media relations, marketing solutions, strategies and creativity with over 25 years of experience. The company has worked with clients in many industries, with more than 300 F&B establishments, as well as serving a vast profile of lifestyle clients in electronics, health, beauty & wellness, art and real estate sectors. Our Clientele includes Michelin Guide Singapore, Paradise Group, Jumbo Seafood Group, Suntory F&B International, The Capitol Kempinski Hotel and many renowned brands. The Role A professional, flexible attitude that lends itself to quality client service would be very useful, as well as the ability to multitask across multiple client accounts and projects under pressing deadlines. As a PR Consultant, you are responsive to customers‚Äô needs and committed to client retention, while managing expectations expertly. You should have impeccable writing skills, comfortable with maneuvering the written word to your intended messaging. With the media, you should be a great networker and connector so as to build sincere, long lasting relationships. Responsibilities: Lead client campaigns from start to end and execute day-to-day workflow for client work such as media pitching, database extraction and media liaison with a team Develop and maintain mailings/product launch timelines, campaign timelines, strategic decks, media lists, status reports, coverage updates Maintain client relationships and counsel clients on strategic PR direction Keep abreast of new developments, trends and opportunities in the media for both clients and the wider industry with strong research skills Monitor and engage media and interest groups on behalf of clients Tailor and develop effective public relations materials such as media pitches, press releases, spokesperson profiles, fact sheets etc. Pitch relevant stories, interactions and engagements to key media contacts successfully Secure top-tier media opportunities, including brand, profile and product stories Build and maintain relationships with media contacts Organise and execute media events/ media tours Ensure quality work is produced on time without errors Requirements: Creative, energetic, resourceful, multi-tasker and able to work under tight deadlines Proficient in Microsoft Office applications (Excel / Powerpoint / Word Doc) Familiarity with websites like Facebook, blog, forum, etc is required Willing to learn and a team worker Ability to work independently

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Freelance Motion Graphics / Content Creator t·∫°i DAMSEL We‚Äôre on the lookout for a talented Creative Content Creator to join our dynamic team on a freelance basis for 3-6 months. Your key role would be to create engaging social media videos centered around fashion, F&B, art and consumer goods. Role Overview: As a freelance Creative Content Creator at DAMSEL, your creativity and mastery of videography, motion graphics, and editing will be the driving force behind our standout content. We‚Äôre open to both seasoned professionals and emerging talents who bring a fresh perspective to the table. Key Responsibilities: Conceptualize, shoot, and edit visually stunning videos aligned with brand aesthetics. Apply motion graphics expertise to enhance video content, adding an extra layer of dynamism and creativity (templates such as motion array to custom AE creations) Stay abreast of industry trends and technologies, leveraging them to elevate our content offerings (example: See TubeGirl video and see how we can play off trends locally) Make social media cut downs of content from past client projects Requirements: Proven experience in videography and content creation, with a standout portfolio showcasing previous work. We are untraditional and are looking for someone who brings their uniqueness and individuality to the table. Together, let‚Äôs create content that turns heads and leaves a lasting impression.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Digital Art Director t·∫°i BRCKTS The Role We are seeking a versatile Art-based creative who is well-tuned to the digitally connected world and passionate in developing and designing social media content. The ideal candidate is one with prior experience working with beauty and confectionary brands. Background in photography and videography / content creation would be a bonus. Who Should Apply You love telling stories ‚Äì be it an insta-worthy photo, GIF with pithy text, infographics video, or some other ‚Äúyet be created‚Äù digital medium. Stories are a means for you to help people understand how to navigate issues in their lives in an entertaining, light-hearted way. You are a self-starter. You own your content. You are a conscientious creative and a critical thinker. You have a keen eye for aesthetics. Every detail matters. You constantly think there is a better way of doing ‚Äúthat‚Äù. You are a lifelong learner who believes in learning by doing. You stay updated on what‚Äôs trending and know the latest buzzwords. You own a first-hand understanding of digital and social media landscape. You want as many people as possible to see your content and are savvy in the world of digital distribution. You get gratification from seeing people like, comment share your content on social media. You enjoy wearing many hats: a troubleshooter and a doer, who receives and gives direction well, who cares deeply about producing high-quality content. Requirements We value attitudes and personality over academics. You should possess understanding and passion in Advertising/Media, Art/Design/Creative Multimedia, Mass Communications or equivalent. At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Senior Executive specialized in Advertising/ Branding/ Design or equivalent. Required Skill(s): creative ideation and conceptualisation, art direction, graphic design, photography, videography, storyboarding, motion graphics, illustration. Experience in social media content design, digital or interactive art is preferred. Motivated, goal-oriented and a proactive team player. Adaptable and comfortable in fluid structure. Ability to think on your feet, plan and carry out your responsibilities with minimal direction. Detail-oriented, keen eye for art direction and styling. This is a hybrid work arrangement, with 2 work days required at the office and 3 work days work from home/ remote.

Requirements We value attitudes and personality over academics. You should possess understanding and passion in Advertising/Media, Art/Design/Creative Multimedia, Mass Communications or equivalent. At least 2 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position. Senior Executive specialized in Advertising/ Branding/ Design or equivalent. Required Skill(s): creative ideation and conceptualisation, art direction, graphic design, photography, videography, storyboarding, motion graphics, illustration. Experience in social media content design, digital or interactive art is preferred. Motivated, goal-oriented and a proactive team player. Adaptable and comfortable in fluid structure. Ability to think on your feet, plan and carry out your responsibilities with minimal direction. Detail-oriented, keen eye for art direction and styling. This is a hybrid work arrangement, with 2 work days required at the office and 3 work days work from home/ remote.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Digital Marketing Intern (Dec - May) t·∫°i GetSolar Care about climate change and want to contribute to solve it? Aspire to shape and contribute to a fast-growing climate technology start-up as an early employee? This could be your opportunity. Apply directly at forms.gle/bo1Ap3mdQa6HFhi2A The opportunity As a Digital Marketing Intern, you‚Äôll gain valuable experience and take ownership in shaping our marketing strategy as an intern in an early start-up. You‚Äôll be a part of a small but collaborative community in Solar AI and ENGIE Factory, passionate about using technology and innovation to solve climate change. We don‚Äôt see our interns any differently from one of us. If you‚Äôre up for it, lead teams, craft strategies or drive new initiatives ‚Äì the sky‚Äôs the limit. What you‚Äôll be responsible for While we encourage you to take ownership of your role and spend time on areas that you find exciting, the following tasks are likely to be a part of your role: Assist in developing a marketing strategy and execute on marketing tactics for both B2C and B2B segments Refine our content marketing and SEO strategy (help us maintain first page SERP on keywords like ‚Äúsolar panel singapore‚Äù!) Research, write and publish content on our blog page, newsletters and online channels (primarily but not limited to articles, case studies and infographics) Assist in pitching to media outlets for PR coverage Manage our digital presence and grow our online audience through our website, newsletters and social media channels Opportunity to manage a digital marketing budget and execute online ad campaigns Monitoring and optimizing our marketing efforts across channels Who we‚Äôre looking for Genuinely excited by a fast paced start-up environment with a bias to action Passion for writing and creating content with demonstrated interest (e.g. personal blogs, publications or previous work experience) Strong willingness to learn and pick up new skills Ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously and deal with ambiguity Strong verbal and written communication skills in English Experience with marketing analytics, paid advertising, SEO or SEM a strong bonus Contract type and location You must be able to commit part-time (at least 3 working days a week) or full-time for a minimum of 20 weeks. The role will be based in Singapore with a flexible start date.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Marketing cum Social Media Intern t·∫°i Embreis (s) Pte Ltd Embreis (S) Pte Ltd aims to deliver health and well-being through proven oriental wisdom and to improve the lives of people. We are seeking creative and resourceful individuals to lead and develop our business by joining us as Marketing cum Social Media Interns. You will provide a strong vision for the company's range of products and services; building on existing partnerships, setting new challenges and ensuring the company reaches its full potential. Roles & Responsibilities: 1. Creating content, including videos and images for use on social media/digital marketing channels. 2. Promoting products, services and content over social media in a way that is consistent with company's brand strategy. 3. Interacting with customers and dealing with customer's inquiries. 4. Brainstorming and developing creative marketing ideas and strategies. 5. Managing budget to be spent on marketing campaigns. 6. Monitoring and analysing performance of offline and digital marketing campaigns. 7. Meeting with potential partners/vendors to pitch potential marketing campaigns or business models. 8. Conducting market research on methods organisations use to promote themselves through social media, analysing and formulating effective digital marketing strategies. 9. Manage the company's website, e-commerce platform and social media platforms. 10. Any other ad-hoc duties as assigned. Technical Skills and Competencies: 1. Strong communication and presentation skills. 2. Effectively bilingual in English and Chinese. 3. Strong knowledge and interest in successful strategies used by other companies to promote through social media. 4. Photo & video-editing experience. 5. Strong organisational skills. 6. Strong analytical ability. 7. Ability to multi-task and work on a number of projects at one time. 8. Strong problem solving skills. 9. Optimising operations and quality of customer/partner interaction (potential/existing) Duration of Traineeship/Attachment: 3 - 9 months

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Senior Executive / Executive t·∫°i VITAL What the role is The Senior Executive/Executive plays an instrumental role in VITAL‚Äôs shared services team, delivering a suite of corporate services in Human Resource, Payroll & Claims, Finance, Pensions, Credit Management, Procurement and Digitalisation Services to our service partners. You may be assigned to undertake a role that aligns to your work experience, skill set, career aspiration as well as organisational need. With good performance, there will be opportunities provided to develop / broaden your skillsets across the various corporate functions in VITAL. What you will be working on As the Senior Executive/Executive in VITAL, your role will encompass the following: - Deliver accurate, quality, and timely outputs. - Provide prompt customer service to our service partners. - Streamline processes via business process re-engineering to enhance efficiency of service delivery. - Use technology such as Excel and RPA to improve productivity. - Analyse available data to suggest process enhancements for improved productivity What we are looking for For a candidate to be successful in the role, they must possess the following attributes and competencies: - Be able to exercise independent judgement and analyse situation when executing the SOPs. - Preferred course of study in professional fields such as Accounting, Business and Human Resource - IT savvy with an appreciation for Robotic Process Automation (RPA) and other new technologies - Proficient in English - Excellent interpersonal, written and oral communication skills - Competent in MS Word and MS Excel - Possess strong analytical and conceptual ability - Independent with strong problem-solving skills - Meticulous with an eye for details - Good customer service skills - Ability to work well individually and in a team - Ability to work well under pressure and tight deadlines - Experience in business process re-engineering is advantageous Successful candidates will be deployed to one of the following functions: HR Services Payroll & Claims Finance Services Pensions Services Credit Management Services Procurement Services Digitalisation Services Candidates with no experience or who are seeking opportunities to return to the workforce are welcomed to apply. We regret to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Vaccination status of applicants will be taken into consideration.

description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Lifestyle / Food Writer t·∫°i Confirm Good Pte Ltd Confirm Good writes authentic recommendations about hyper-local experiences in Singapore. If you have a knack for writing and love to bring your words to life, we can be the platform for you to inspire millions of people who we produce content for. We seek passionate lifestyle content writers who are all about the latest trends in fashion, food, travel, culture, beauty and local activities‚Äî Writers that are able to express and attract through witty writing and photography. Responsibilities - Creating highly relevant and engaging content for our audiences - Contribute story ideas, finding new angles and bring inspiration - Participating in day-to-day news gathering and reporting to produce high impact and effective written content, with a focus on lifestyle topics including food, events, entertainment, and travel - Ensuring writing and photography are professionally executed - Translating such content for social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, Telegram - Telegram media scheduling and posting - Covering media invites, new launches and events on the behalf of the Company Requirements: - You are the Heartbeat of the latest lifestyle news and trends - A strong, clear writing style that reflects creativity, wit and knowledge - You can take the Editorial team to greater heights and depth - An eye for detail to portray accurate information with grammatically correct sentences - Good photographic eye - Creativity to think of eye-catching headlines - You honour editorial integrity and promote Positive working cultures - Fast learner and able to accept feedback and changes - Ability to write SEO optimised article Please provide portfolio showcasing your writing work for our review.
