description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Project Engineer t·∫°i Youyi Technology Pte Ltd We are looking for a dynamic, autonomous and organized Project Engineer for engineering and technical project tasks. You will plan, execute and manage technical and logistical tasks to meet project deliverables, which includes vendor management and coordination, team support and documentation. ¬∑ Execute engineering tasks such as system and/or devices installation and deployment ¬∑ Perform site surveys and site measurements independently / with external vendors & partners to ensure these are sufficient for installation of touchpoints & devices ¬∑ Work closely and manage vendors to identify, track and correct deployment issues (hardware replacement) with vendors performing touchpoint installation ¬∑ Perform hardware and workstation installation, as well as basic software installation and configuration tasks. ¬∑ Create or update procedures and project documentation ¬∑ Manage a multitude of vendors involved in deployment and monitor and follow-up with their progress to ensure assigned timelines are met ¬∑ Escalate issues to the deployment manager / project manager if vendors / engineering tasks face challenges that cannot be resolved ¬∑ Track and document hardware and software quotations, procurement and delivery ¬∑ Perform inventory tracking and asset tagging ¬∑ Work closely with the integration team to provide support during System Integration Tests, ORAT and Go Live ¬∑ Ability to work in a fast paced & dynamic environment, handling complex deployment and integration tasks with professionalism ¬∑ Conscious about service quality, with an appropriate sense of urgency in fulfilling customer requirements ¬∑ Possess strong troubleshooting skills and techniques. ¬∑ Experience in deployment of end user devices, touch points such as PC Workstations, CCTV, Wifi Access Point ¬∑ Experience in network or server equipment deployment (rack/stack/cabling) and basic configurations is preferred ¬∑ Good knowledge in different OS like Windows 10, Windows server and Linux (RedHat) ¬∑ IT administration skills involving TCP/IP Networking
require: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Project Engineer t·∫°i Youyi Technology Pte Ltd We are looking for a dynamic, autonomous and organized Project Engineer for engineering and technical project tasks. description: Chi ti·∫øt c√¥ng vi·ªác Digital Marketing Specialist (Internship) t·∫°i gym wear movement Are you a creative powerhouse with a passion for music, social media, and the ever-evolving world of influencers? We're seeking dynamic individuals who are plugged into the latest trends and have a genuine love for TikTok. If you're ready to make your mark in the world of digital marketing, we want you on our team! Job Description As a Social Media Marketing Intern, you'll play a vital role in our marketing team, helping us craft compelling strategies, engaging content, and meaningful connections with our audience. Here's what you'll be doing: Crafting Creative Content: You'll be the creative force behind our @gymwearmovement account, producing daily content that resonates with our audience. Engaging and Monitoring: Interact with our social media followers, engaging in conversations using the brand's voice, and ensuring a positive online community. Influencer Outreach: Identify and reach out to emerging influencers and creators, fostering valuable partnerships to expand our reach. Stay Ahead of Trends: Keep your finger on the pulse of the latest social media platform trends, and bring fresh ideas on how we can make our presence felt on these platforms. Data-Driven Decisions: Collaborate with the social team to analyze performance metrics and adjust creative strategies to optimize our posts. Brainstorming Brilliance: Participate in brainstorming sessions to generate exciting content ideas and innovative marketing strategies. Content Production: Be self-sufficient in creating engaging content, and work closely with influencers and our creative agency to ensure top-notch creative assets. Website Magic: Conceptualize and optimize website conversions, enhancing our online presence. Retail Support: Provide support for retail activities in Tang Studio, contributing to our overall marketing efforts. Qualifications Currently enrolled in a college or university program. A genuine passion for an active lifestyle and a strong interest in the social and digital space. Proven experience as a social media creator, with a deep understanding of what resonates with audiences on various platforms. History of creating high-performing content that captured attention, either personally or on behalf of a partner. A creative and innovative mindset, always ready to think outside the box. Exceptional attention to detail, reliability, and responsibility. A proactive self-starter with excellent communication skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Benefits Build an Impressive Portfolio: This internship offers you the opportunity to curate an outstanding portfolio of videos and content creation. You'll work on exciting projects that will showcase your creativity and skills, setting you up for a promising career in digital marketing and content creation. Ideal for Fashion Enthusiasts: If you have a passion for fashion and love creating content, this role is tailor-made for you. You'll have the chance to immerse yourself in the world of fashion, contributing to our brand's presence in this dynamic industry. Hands-On Experience: Gain invaluable hands-on experience in the field of social media marketing and influencer collaboration. You'll work closely with industry professionals, influencers, and creative agencies, broadening your knowledge and skills. Networking Opportunities: Forge valuable connections within the fashion and social media industries. You'll have the chance to network with influencers, creators, and professionals, opening doors to exciting future collaborations. Mentorship and Learning: Receive mentorship from our experienced marketing team, who will guide you in honing your skills and navigating the complexities of the digital marketing landscape. Flexible Work Environment: Enjoy the flexibility of working from home and managing your own schedule, making it easier to balance your academic commitments with your internship. Complimentary Activewear: As a part of our team, you'll receive complimentary activewear, ensuring you're always dressed comfortably and stylishly, whether you're creating content or pursuing your active lifestyle. Paid Internship: We value your contributions and offer a paid internship for a duration of 6 months, ensuring that your efforts are rewarded. Join us in creating captivating content, exploring the world of fashion, and shaping your career in the digital marketing industry. This internship is your gateway to a world of creativity, innovation, and endless possibilities in the digital realm.
